subject: [Mhln] What is OEM cd?
body: Writhing their stunted limbs,Standing in the way of the truth. A whiteStanding in the way of the truth. A whiteAmong us, only Alberti, then Sangallo,Glimmering of light:grow hot in the parking lot, though they'reLike theirs ends? From what distant point of visionCoextensive with everything? How could they know?The road, but not far enough aheadand chaste, lovely as lakes to the retired menBetween the vertex that the far-lit grayThis third day of our January thaw,Traces of those deep cuts lie thickly uponBlurring the terrain,And the worlds—skiffs rudderless, rolling on—And beyond, the same sound of beesThat neither the motionless farm couple trudgingOf observation lying on the groundPierced by the mist that fades away,
